DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To test Kinesio Tex Gold ® able change electromyographic signal iliocostalis longissimus muscle patient chronic nonspecific low back pain . Study design : Three-arm , randomize control trial blind assessor . Location study : Physical therapy Clinic Universidade Cidade de São Paulo ( UNICID ) Patients : Sixty-three patient chronic nonspecific low back pain . Intervention : Patients allocate Kinesio Taping® group receive tape describe manufacturer 's manual . The patient assign placebo group receive Micropore tape control group receive intervention . All group assess 30 minute intervention Measures : The follow outcome measure : 1 ) Muscle activity 2 ) pain intensity . Limitations : Therapists blind .
DOC.brief_title: Is Kinesio Taping Able Influence Electrical Activity Muscles Patients With Low Back Pain ?
DOC.detailed_description: Patients seek care low back pain physiotherapy clinic Universidade São Paulo invite participate study inform objective study evaluation procedure . Patients agree participate sign consent form . Patients assessed baseline immediately intervention . Investigators collect data regard personal anthropometric data , well pain intensity ( measure 0-10 numerical rating scale follow point ) disability ( measure 0-24 point Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire baseline ) . Finally , muscle activation evaluate surface electromyography maximum voluntary contraction trunk 30 degree position lumbar dynamometer adjust anthropometric profile patient . The average maximum value muscular strength obtain maximum voluntary contraction . The electromyography capture muscle activity integrate manner electrogoniometers transmit data via Bluetooth desktop MWX8 software ( Biometrics ) analyze data . Before instrumentation patient instruct perform trunk extension movement therapist 's command become familiar equipment . Soon hold instrumentation ( placement electromyography electrodes electrogoniometers lumbar dynamometer ) maximal voluntary contraction collect trunk extension without Kinesio tap
DOC.criteria: Patients chronic low back pain ( duration least 3 month ) , without leg pain . patient use Kinesio Taping previously contraindication use Kinesio Tex Gold® , allergy severe skin problem . patient nerve root compromise patient fracture , tumor , inflammatory and/or infectious disease patient severe cardiorespiratory and/or metabolic diseases previous spinal surgery
